SEARCH
Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze.Utilities

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.Utilities.Manager
public class Manager extends Object
This class serves as a singleton manager for various utility classes in the game, such as the SoundManager. It ensures that only one instance of each utility class is created and provides a global point of access to them.

      public static Manager getInstance()
